project.description: First Russian VR360 documentary from VRability project. Maxim Kiselev is the only professional figure ice skater on a wheelchair in the world. Experience his life in 360 spherical world and learn more about him and posibilities for people with disabilities in Russia at vrability.ru/en Project authors – Georgy Molodtsov, Stanislav Kolesnik Producers - Dmitry Agutin, Georgy Molodtsov info@vrability.ru.

project.description: The Women's March. New York City. A historic turnout of support for women's rights and equality. Captured in 360, to help understand the scope of how large an event this was. Special thanks to Tyler Pridgen for help in producing this.
